title: [Large-scale] Agricultural Science Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-Level Agricultural Science Fundamentals and General Problem-Solving Competencies
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with intermediate expertise in agricultural problem-solving. They can use smartphones but lack PC access, with a focus on in-class collaborative activities over asynchronous discussions.

learning_goals: Systematically analyze real-world problems in agricultural settings and propose solutions.
Perform the stages of problem definition → data collection → solution derivation → evaluation according to the PBL process.
Enhance the ability to integrate diverse perspectives and reach consensus through team-based collaboration.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
